definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="AmbientTimer">AmbientTimer</variable><variable type="Number" id="AmbientSelector">AmbientSelector</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_dimensionids"><value name="a"><block type="entity_dimension_id"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="get_dimensionid"><field name="dimension">CUSTOM:AlienDimension</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:AmbientTimer</field><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="155">This acts as a timer, adding 1 to the timer every tick. Remember: there are 20 ticks in every second</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:AmbientTimer</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><comment pinned="false" h="51" w="161">This is so the timer ends at 5 minutes</comment><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:AmbientTimer</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2359</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:AmbientSelector</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The variable is set to a random number to allow for variations in ambience</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">These number range selectors are to choose between 4 random choises of ambience</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The AND is used to make sure 2 or more sounds don't play at the same time</comment><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:AmbientSelector</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:AmbientSelector</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.75</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><field name="sound">CUSTOM:alien_ambient1</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">You can set these to whatever sound you'd like. Ambience, music, whatever</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:AmbientSelector</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.75</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:AmbientSelector</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><field name="sound">CUSTOM:alien_ambient2_1</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><field has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:AmbientTimer</field><comment pinned="false" h="67" w="161">When set to 0, the timer resets and beings counting upwards again</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field
